医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
斑马鱼模型揭示卡介苗疫苗如何触发膀胱癌的免疫反应使用斑马鱼“阿凡达”，这是由 Champalimaud 基金会 (CF) 癌症发展和先天免疫逃避实验室开发的动物模型，由 Rita Fior、Mayra Martínez-López 领导，Mayra Martínez-López 是该实验室的前博士生，现在在德黑兰大学工作厄瓜多尔基多的 las Américas 及其同事研究了卡介苗 (BCG) 疫苗对膀胱癌细胞作用的初始步骤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Zebrafish-model-reveals-how-BCG-vaccine-triggers-immune-response-in-bladder-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Zebrafish-model-reveals-how-BCG-vaccine-triggers-immune-response-in-bladder-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba33672f-a7b7-4c5e-96d7-72093e53450f Thu, 08 Aug 2024 12:14:49 -0400 Zebrafish model reveals how BCG vaccine triggers immune response in bladder cancer
癌症治疗中模拟禁食饮食的回顾研究人员介绍了周期性禁食和模拟禁食饮食 (FMD) 在癌症治疗中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Review-of-fasting-mimicking-diets-in-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Review-of-fasting-mimicking-diets-in-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3b49be8-5037-4e47-8c4e-f2de0e660a68 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 09:06:00 -0400 Review of fasting-mimicking diets in cancer treatment
三分之一的 NHS 奶昔和汤饮食参与者实现了糖尿病缓解英国研究人员通过完全膳食替代评估了胰岛素非依赖性糖尿病的缓解情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/A-third-of-NHS-shakes-and-soups-diet-participants-achieve-diabetes-remission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/A-third-of-NHS-shakes-and-soups-diet-participants-achieve-diabetes-remission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b0bf7c6-7310-445e-bd85-f847d00df62a Thu, 08 Aug 2024 08:51:00 -0400 A third of NHS shakes and soups diet participants achieve diabetes remission
研究显示，食用含有赤藓糖醇的食物会增加心血管事件的风险克利夫兰诊所的新研究表明，食用含有赤藓糖醇（一种流行的人造甜味剂）的食物会增加心脏病和中风等心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Consuming-foods-with-erythritol-increases-risk-of-cardioangio-events-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Consuming-foods-with-erythritol-increases-risk-of-cardioangio-events-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d87d51b-8bcc-4d5e-a4e2-c85c1f6e0bb4 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 08:28:36 -0400 Consuming foods with erythritol increases risk of cardiovascular events, study shows
唾液测试在指示儿童反复呼吸道感染的严重程度方面优于血液测试与标准血液检测相比，唾液检测可以更准确地表明儿童反复呼吸道感染的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Saliva-test-outperforms-blood-test-in-indicating-the-severity-of-recurrent-respiratory-infections-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Saliva-test-outperforms-blood-test-in-indicating-the-severity-of-recurrent-respiratory-infections-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b040467-a770-4726-8801-62f9a3f3d677 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 08:22:15 -0400 Saliva test outperforms blood test in indicating the severity of recurrent respiratory infections in children
短时间的高强度训练对中风幸存者有效根据今天发表的研究，对于中风后六个月或更长时间的人来说，进行 19 分钟的一分钟、短时间高强度间歇训练可能比传统的 20-30 分钟中等强度锻炼更有效中风，美国中风协会（美国心脏协会的一个部门）的同行评审科学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Short-bursts-of-high-intensity-training-found- effective-for-中风-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Short-bursts-of-high-intensity-training-found- effective-for-中风-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00dd5294-d9ef-4b50-8db9-3573308aad29 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 08:17:01 -0400 Short bursts of high-intensity training found effective for stroke survivors
新技术揭示运动神经元疾病的异常伯明翰大学开发的一项新技术已经确定了与运动神经元疾病相关的病理异常。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-technique-reveals-abnormalities-in-motor-neurone-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-technique-reveals-abnormalities-in-motor-neurone-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4738591-f979-4987-a862-2a859cfbe149 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 08:09:46 -0400 New technique reveals abnormalities in motor neurone disease
新拨款 1130 万美元用于探索心血管疾病中的内皮细胞功能障碍借助美国国立卫生研究院新提供的 1130 万美元计划项目拨款，奥古斯塔大学佐治亚医学院血管生物学中心的专家正在努力更好地了解心血管疾病的潜在机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-24113-million-grant-to-explore-endothelial-cell-dysfunction-in-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-24113-million-grant-to-explore-endothelial-cell-dysfunction-in-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbe39e9a-80c4-4766-94d7-e2eca3c33863 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 08:01:08 -0400 New $11.3 million grant to explore endothelial cell dysfunction in cardiovascular disease
TikTok 上的厌食症内容可能会损害女性的身体形象和心理健康花大量时间在 TikTok 上的女性 -；尤其是那些看到大量厌食症内容的人-；一项新的研究表明，他们对自己的外表感觉更糟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Pro-anorexia-content-on-TikTok-may-harm-womens-body-image-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Pro-anorexia-content-on-TikTok-may-harm-womens-body-image-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7dfbc13-7e1e-43cc-8c0a-3d0f41a95d71 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 07:54:07 -0400 Pro-anorexia content on TikTok may harm women's body image and mental health
审查显示慢性疼痛患者阿片类药物依赖率很高对 148 项研究进行的一项新的科学审查发现，近十分之一的患者有阿片类药物依赖或阿片类药物使用障碍，近三分之一的患者表现出依赖和阿片类药物使用障碍的症状，这些研究纳入了超过 430 万接受处方阿片类止痛药治疗的成年慢性疼痛患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Review-reveals-high-rates-of-opioid-dependence-among-chronic-pain-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Review-reveals-high-rates-of-opioid-dependence-among-chronic-pain-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f901ba5e-f382-475e-88b2-33509406f580 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 07:43:01 -0400 Review reveals high rates of opioid dependence among chronic pain patients
